title: 121: An (Unfinished) Survivor’s Story: Chantelle Dashner-Griffith
itunes:title: 121: An (Unfinished) Survivor’s Story: Chantelle Dashner-Griffith
description:
(TRIGGER WARNING: violence, sexual assault, and attempted homicide) 
The Broads are joined by listener Chantelle Dashner-Griffith as she tells the unfinished story of the assault against her and attempted homicide. Please join us as we listen to the powerful words of a woman who is a survivor and not finished as she seeks justice against her attackers.
CHANTELLE DASHNER-GRIFFITH:
READ and SHARE Chantelle’s story here: https://gettinggoodatrunningaway.org/2020/02/08/getting-good-at-running-away-my-survival-story/
FOLLOW her at: @chantelledg
DONATE to BARCC through Change for Chantelle: https://www.classy.org/fundraiser/2580185
WHO TO CONTACT: 
*Congresswoman Ayanna Pressley: her office in DC can be contacted by phone at (202) 225-5111 or her IG handle is @ayannapressley if you want to send DMs
*Senator Elizabeth Warren: phone at her DC office is (202) 224-4543 and her IG handle is @elizabethwarren if you want to send DMs

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
